Paper.Title: Incremental Construction of a Lexical Transducer for Korean

Section.Paragraph: The paper describes the construction of a lexical transducer for Korean that can be used for stemming and generation. The method contains two innovations: (1) two h.'vel rules ms well-formedness constraints in the initial phase; (2) the combination of intersection and composition of rule transducers in a dee\[) cascade \['or the final re.suit.
